Title: Mahou Shoujo Liese Prettia
Description: ['The Japanese cosmetic brand Kao wants to add a little magic to your beauty routine with ', Liese Prettia, ' hair color. The company began streaming a commercial that introduced the first "episode" of ', Mahou Shoujo Liese Prettia, ". Rize is a second year middle school student with a cloud mascot that hides in her hair. The mascot is meant to resemble the logo from Liese Prettia hair color boxes. She transforms and defeats the attacking demon with a splash of bubbles. Just when it seems like the magic is over, Liese Prettia begins speaking to the anime's viewer about transforming her own hair.", ' ', ' ', ' ', ' A make-over can really leave you feeling magical and it looks like there really is a magical girl for every occasion. ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: ANN)']
